text: so it's generally when you involve in eating intermediary and that's because the end buyer wants some transference of trust and they trust the USDA more than they trust a buyer that a grower that they're never going to meet and when you start looking at Gap there are slightly different types of Gap there's Gap specifically for mushrooms for tomatoes for aquaponics um and for a few other things um and there are certain like categories within Gap so there's the Harvest step or the production step uh like field production there's the harvesting or pack house and then there's post Harvest handling unless I don't know about you because I think at some point you uh would wash your sunflower shoots which would probably be considered post Harvest handling since we don't wash our Greens in any way we did not have to comply with or fulfill or go through the Hoops of the post Harvest like category of requirements
